General.Name: Cupid Limited
General.Description: Cupid Limited designs, manufactures, and markets male and female condoms in India and internationally. The company also offers water based lubricant jellies; and in vitro diagnostic devices. In addition, it provides contract manufacturing services. The company was formerly known as Cupid Condom Limited and changed its name to Cupid Limited in January 2006. Cupid Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Nashik, India.
